localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Pickle helps companies understand every phone and video conversation they have with their customers. We do this by automatically transcribing calls and extracting key insights, questions, and trends.
blogPost.body: Pickle helps companies understand every phone and video conversation they have with their customers. We do this by automatically transcribing calls and extracting key insights, questions, and trends.
blogPost.title: Pickle - Transcribe and analyze phone and video conversations
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Pickle帮助企业了解他们与客户的每一次电话和视频对话。我们通过自动转录电话并提取关键见解、问题和趋势来实现这一目标。
localize.tagline: 抄录和分析电话和视频对话。

localize.description: Pickle幫助企業瞭解他們與客戶的每一次電話和視頻對話。我們通過自動轉錄電話並提取關鍵見解、問題和趨勢來實現這一目標。
localize.tagline: 抄錄和分析電話和視頻對話。

previous.excerpt: Keka wants to be an easy to use little app, well integrated in macOS and very powerful. And it is. You can compress files in all common (and not that common) formats and uncompress almost every format file, with and without encryption.
previous.title: Keka - The macOS file archiver

localize.description: Keka希望成为一个易于使用的小程序，很好地集成在macOS中，并且非常强大。而它也确实如此。你可以压缩所有常见（和不常见）格式的文件，并解压几乎所有格式的文件，有加密和不加密。
Keka希望成爲一個易於使用的小程序，很好地集成在macOS中，並且非常強大。而它也確實如此。你可以壓縮所有常見（和不常見）格式的文件，並解壓幾乎所有格式的文件，有加密和不加密。

next.excerpt: Discover new interesting things by exploring the space around links 🚀.
next.title: Arkipelago.space - A map of fascinating things on the internet

localize.description: 通过探索链接周围的空间发现新的有趣的东西🚀。
localize.tagline: 互联网上迷人的事物地图

localize.description: 通過探索鏈接周圍的空間發現新的有趣的東西🚀。
localize.tagline: 互聯網上迷人的事物地圖
